    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Starts a Peer for a distributed backup system with the specified arguments. Peer is started by validating the command line arguments and initialising the Peer object which also initialises the RMI thread and the channel listener threads.
        Parameters:
        args - 1. protocol version
        args - 2. peer ID
        args - 3. service access point (RMI Object name)
        args - 4. multicast control channel IP:port
        args - 5. multicast data backup IP:port
        args - 6. multicast data recovery IP:port
        args - 7. logging level
        args - 8. logging method

      • parseArguments

        private static void parseArguments(java.lang.String[] args)
        Parses and validates command line arguments, sets up logging management and creates the Peer object.
        Parameters:
        args - command line arguments received

      • parseChannelHost

        private static java.net.InetAddress parseChannelHost(java.lang.String s,
                                                     java.lang.String channelName)
        Parses a hostname in IP:port format, exits program if hostname is invalid.
        Parameters:
        s - the hostname string
        channelName - the channel name
        Returns:
        InetAddress of the host

      • parseChannelPort

        private static int parseChannelPort(java.lang.String s,
                                    java.lang.String channelName)
        Parses a port in IP:port format, exits program if port is invalid.
        Parameters:
        s - port
        channelName - the channel name
        Returns:
        port as integer

      • validateInt

        private static int validateInt(java.lang.String s,
                               java.lang.String errMsg)
        Attempts to convert string to int and exits program if conversion is not possible.
        Parameters:
        s - string to convert
        errMsg - error message to print
        Returns:
        converted integer

      • validateHost

        private static java.net.InetAddress validateHost(java.lang.String s)
        Validates hostname as multicast address and exits program if invalid.
        Parameters:
        s - the multicast adress string
        Returns:
        InetAddress of the host

      • cmdErr

        private static void cmdErr(java.lang.String message)
        Prints error message and program usage. Exits program with error code -1.
        Parameters:

        protocol - protocol being executed
